sn6.7:3.1: 7. Kokālikasutta
sn6.7:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā divāvihāragato hoti paṭisallīno.
sn6.7:4.3: Atha kho subrahmā ca paccekabrahmā suddhāvāso ca paccekabrahmā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn6.7:4.5: Atha kho subrahmā paccekabrahmā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
